job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features
     * Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams
     * Research, prototype, and select appropriate COTS and in-house technology and design
     * Collaborate with team to design, develop, and occasionally enhance or maintain existing systems
     * Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards
     * Create documentation including system and sequence diagrams
     * Create appropriate data pipelines for AI / ML
     * Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity
     * Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept
     * Occasionally present research and work to socialize and share knowledge across the organization

   ENVIRONMENT, TOOLS & TECHNOLOGIES :
     * Agile / Scrum
     * Operating Systems - Mac, Linux
     * Python, JavaScript, Node.js
     * React UI / UX
     * LLMs (OpenAI GPT-X, Claude, embedding models)
     * Vector indexing / database, RAG, Agents
     * APIs GraphQL, REST
     * Docker, Kubernetes
     * Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI
     * SQL (Postgres RDS), NoSQL (Cassandra, Elasticsearch)
     * Messaging - Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQS
     * GitHub, IDE (your choice)
job_details.full_text:
Full Stack Software Engineer - AI

* Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features
     * Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams
     * Research, prototype, and select appropriate COTS and in-house technology and design
     * Collaborate with team to design, develop, and occasionally enhance or maintain existing systems
     * Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards
     * Create documentation including system and sequence diagrams
     * Create appropriate data pipelines for AI / ML
     * Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity
     * Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept
     * Occasionally present research and work to socialize and share knowledge across the organization

   ENVIRONMENT, TOOLS & TECHNOLOGIES :
     * Agile / Scrum
     * Operating Systems - Mac, Linux
     * Python, JavaScript, Node.js
     * React UI / UX
     * LLMs (OpenAI GPT-X, Claude, embedding models)
     * Vector indexing / database, RAG, Agents
     * APIs GraphQL, REST
     * Docker, Kubernetes
     * Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI
     * SQL (Postgres RDS), NoSQL (Cassandra, Elasticsearch)
     * Messaging - Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQS
     * GitHub, IDE (your choice)

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the use and development of generative AI technologies, including LLMs (GPT-X, Claude), RAG, and Agents. It also mentions creating data pipelines for AI/ML and developing software systems around these AI features, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. While it involves software development and MLOps, the primary focus is on generative AI applications.

job_tasks.justification: Phrases like 'Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features' and 'Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams' indicate a need to understand business context and translate it into technical actions.
job_tasks.phrase: Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features

job_tasks.justification: This phrase shows collaboration to assess the business impact of new features on existing systems and teams.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Create appropriate data pipelines for AI / ML' directly relates to preparing data for model training and deployment.
job_tasks.phrase: Create appropriate data pipelines for AI / ML

job_tasks.justification: The explicit mention of 'Utilize and apply generative AI for products' points to the core task of working with generative models.
job_tasks.phrase: Utilize and apply generative AI for products

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'embedding models' is a specific type of model used in generative AI applications.
RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) is a key technique in building generative AI applications.
Agents are a component of advanced generative AI systems, often built using LLM frameworks.
The role involves designing, developing, and enhancing systems, which are core software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: design, develop, and occasionally enhance or maintain existing systems

job_tasks.justification: Building user-facing applications is a primary goal of software development.
Developing APIs (GraphQL, REST) is a fundamental aspect of building integrated software systems.
The mention of Docker and Kubernetes indicates experience with containerization and orchestration, key components of MLOps.
Cloud platforms like AWS and Azure are essential for deploying and managing AI/ML systems in production.
job_tasks.phrase: Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI

job_tasks.justification: Messaging queues like Kafka, RabbitMQ, and SQS are often used in distributed systems and MLOps pipelines for asynchronous communication and data streaming.
The phrase 'Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept' implies a continuous integration and deployment cycle, common in MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept

Collaborate to identify new feature impacts

Occasionally present research and work to socialize and share knowledge across the organization

design, develop, and occasionally enhance or maintain existing systems
